title: Rising global shipping traffic could lead to surge in invasive species

title_detail.value: Rising global shipping traffic could lead to surge in invasive species

summary: Rising global maritime traffic could lead to sharp increases in invasive species around the world over the next 30 years, according to a new study. The findings suggest that shipping growth will far outweigh climate change in the spread of non-indigenous pests to new environments in coming decades.
